title: How to make a domain redirecting with exabyte - Quora

response.answer_text: You can use this guide to modify your ‘A’ record to point your domain to the IP of your new website while leaving your ‘MX’ records alone. This will allow you mail to stay the way it is, but host your site on a new location. https://support.exabytes.com/support/solutions/articles/14000032246-update-dns-records-using-dns-management-tools-via-client-area
